data.title: Pula, Croatia to BMT
data.meta_description: Time conversion from CEST (Central European Summer Time) (+2) to Biel Mean Time(+1). Pula, Croatia to BMT time zones converter, calculator, table and map.
data.text:
Time Difference

CEST (Central European Summer Time) is 1 hour ahead of Biel Mean Time

4:00 pm16:00 in Pula, Croatia is 3:00 pm15:00 in BMT

Pula to BMT call time

Best time for a conference call or a meeting is between 9am-6pm in Pula which corresponds to 8am-5pm in BMT

4:00 pm16:00 CEST (Central European Summer Time) (Pula, Croatia). Offset UTC +2:00 hours

3:00 pm15:00 Biel Mean Time (BMT). Offset UTC +1:00 hour

4:00 pm16:00 Pula, Croatia / 3:00 pm15:00 BMT
